TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/MdiHelpButton extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Window::MdiHelpButton abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton>类返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>不同状态的**帮助**的 MDI 子窗口的按钮。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Normal%2A>属性。 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#407](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#407)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#407](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#407)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 帮助 * * 按钮处于禁用状态的 MDI 子窗口。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Disabled%2A>属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiHelpButton.Disabled%2A>属性。 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton4`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Hot As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the hot state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 在热状态的 MDI 子窗口的帮助 * * 按钮。

remarks.format:
